name: Dungeon Crawler Warrior
description:
A DUNGEON CRAWLER THAT SHOULD'VE BEEN
ON THE GAME BOY!!!! Dungeon Crawler Warrior is a dungeon crawler game and it is a spinoff to the popular Dungeon Warrior games. In this dungeon crawler game you play as either a boy or a girl and you must enter a dungeon to find the legendary sword of god to grant the discoverer a wish that their heart content. The boy seeks out the sword to restore his home village after a monster attack. The girl seeks out the sword to heal her sick mother. This features 7 different dungeon levels. Depending who you play as the shops sell different weapons and armor Retro Game Boy style graphics Retro 8-bit soundtrack No Random Battles Dungeon levels differ depending who you play as Note: This is an apple mac exclusive title.
